templates.name: How do I care for my beaded bracelets?
templates.content: Our beaded bracelets are handmade with all-natural stones and durable nylon or top-grade Japanese stretch rope. To ensure they last, avoid chemicals and pat dry after getting wet. These pieces are very durable and can handle most things, but if you want to keep them looking their best, this is how.

templates.name: Does Relizen work for night sweats?
templates.content: In an open-label study of over 373 women, Relizen significantly reduced the frequency of night sweats by 66%. Additionally, patients found that Relizen reduced the intensity of their night sweats by 67%.

templates.name: What products would you suggest for acne or acne scarring?
templates.content: To treat acne, we would recommend our Acne Reparatif and Masque de Glaise. Also, all our products in our renewal collection will help with the renewal of skin. For Acne prone skin we would recommend checking out the Moisturizing Renewal Lotion. For acne scarring we would recommend our exfoliating products Le polish and Masque de Brillance.

templates.name: Can I put Bellzi items in the washing machine? / Care Instructions
templates.content: We suggest you spot wash and air dry all of your Bellzi Friends.

templates.name: What should I do with the ice packs in my order?
templates.content: Ice gel packs are reusable. Store them in your freezer and use them to keep food cold on road trips, picnics, or outings. Throw them away anytime they are punctured or leaking. The contents of ice gel packs are non-toxic and contain 98% water and 2% sodium polyacrylate, a polymer commonly found in many household and personal items. The product contains no substances which at their given concentration, are considered to be hazardous to health.

templates.name: Can the diet be stopped at Day 4?
templates.content: The 5-day cycle has been carefully designed based on preclinical and clinical data, and therefore we recommend consuming all five days as directed to the extent possible.

templates.name: Can put the S1 single seat on the S2?
templates.content: Yes, you can.

templates.name: What does USDA Prime mean?
templates.content:
Great question! USDA Prime beef represents the top 2% of all beef in the United States. These cuts are recognized notably for their superior marbling, flavoring, and tenderness and are cut with care by our expert butchers. 

Many competitors will try to fool you with tricky wording with words like "choice" and "angus" but if you're not seeing "USDA Prime," you're not getting the very best. For a truly exquisite steak experience, try our USDA Prime Steaks here: https://newyorksteak.com/pages/usda-prime-steaks

templates.name: How much caffeine is in your Lightning Blend?
templates.content: Our Lightning Blend contains 200mg of caffeine. That's equivalent to about two cups of coffee.

templates.name: What size should I get for the Arm Trimmer? How do I measure myself?
templates.content: Don't use your shirt or pant size to choose your fit. Clothing sizing is not the same as Trimmer sizing. Measure yourself around the widest part of your bicep and refer to the size chart on the product page. If your measurement falls between sizes I suggest going up a size to ensure the best fit. Your Trimmer is secured with velcro and can be adjusted tighter.

templates.content: Our minimum age requirement for permanent jewelry is 12. Anyone under the age of 16 will need to be accompanied by an adult and needs to be able to sit still long enough for us to be able to weld.

templates.name: Will the GunSkins Pistol Skin fit my gun?
templates.content: Pistols come in many shapes and sizes. Our single Pistol Skin kit will fit most semi-automatic or revolver type pistols. The reason for this is because the kit is generic and requires the user to trim to fit their specific model. Check more about it here https://support.gunskins.com/hc/en-us/articles/236347547-Will-the-GunSkins-Pistol-Skin-fit-my-gun-

templates.name: What do the 'approved', 'pending' and 'cancelled' statuses in my rewards tab mean?
templates.content: Approved means that you earned these points and they can be redeemed on rewards immediately. Pending means that these points just need to be verified before you can redeem them. This typically applies to purchases and referrals. In 7 days, you'll see these points as approved. Cancelled means that these points will not be added to your account. For example, this will happen if you cancel a purchase (the points will change from pending to cancelled).

templates.name: Replacement insoles
templates.content:
We love to offer replacement insoles to help keep your shoes feeling great! While we do not sell replacement insoles, we do have a courtesy replacement program for defective insoles from shoes that are still within their life expectancy of approximately 300-500 miles or 4-6 months. We currently have limited quantity available, but we are happy to check our inventory for insoles in your size. If you are interested in replacing defective insoles please contact Customer Care via phone, 1-855-427-6657, weekdays 6am-5pm PST, or via email HERE.

 

If we do not have your size we recommend reaching out to your local running store to explore other solutions. Check out our Store Locator https://www.brooksrunning.com/en_us/store-locator to find a store near you!

templates.name: What makes vosges chocolates different than other truffles?
templates.content: We use only fresh and natural ingredients without any preservatives and only the finest chocolate. For instance, the Black Pearl truffle is dark chocolate infused with Japanese wasabi and ginger and topped with ceremonial matcha.

templates.name: I don't need a stand! Do you have that option?
templates.content:
Our bubble-x plastic material units come with a stand that's attached with velcro, while the cardboard and foam core are attached with double-sided tape for no extra charge. 

 Though if you'd like, we can make one with a stand that can be removed so the unit can be folded back up and reused - just select the bubble-x plastic material.

templates.name: Can I return at a store?
templates.content: You can return online or in any of our store locations. If you return online you can receive a full refund or credit. If you return in store you will receive store credit only.

templates.content: Please note that you will need to speak with your HR department regarding the discounts.

templates.name: What are testers?
templates.content: Testers are genuine, authentic, fresh and 100% original. They contain the same original fragrance and are used by department stores to help promote a particular fragrance. Testers are made by the manufacturer and sometimes come in a plain box, or without the fancy cap. Because there is no decorative packaging, we can purchase these items for less and pass the savings on to you. If the UPC codes or any other tracking codes are missing, altered, or defaced from any product box or bottle, it was not done by the manufacturer and occurred in the supply chain after it left the manufacturer.

templates.name: Do you price match?/Offer price adjustments?
templates.content:
If you find a lower price simply click the "Request Price Match" link found next to the price of every product on our website and we will reply by email if the price match is approved. Price match requests are typically responded to within 24 business hours. Please note that products listed on Amazon, eBay and JET are not eligible for price matching.

If you find a lower price on our website within 21 days of your purchase we will be happy to refund the difference in the form of a store credit.

templates.name: Can Supernova be used on color treated hair?
templates.content: Supernova should not be used on color treated hair. It's for silver/blonde/platinum/grey hair, to remove the warm tones.

templates.name: Is your food shipped frozen?
templates.content: Our food is shipped fresh at refrigerated temperatures but never frozen. Our food should be eaten by the use by dates on the packaging. Our Kids Meals, Finger Foods and Mighty Bites can also be frozen for up to 90 days as long as they are placed in the freezer before the use by date.

templates.name: Are your products safe to use on botox areas?
templates.content: Our patches are made of 100% medical grade silicone made up of Dimethicone, Silica, Hydrogen Dimethicone and Stearic Acid. They are completely safe to use even after botox treatments, however, if you notice any type of redness or allergic reaction, please discontinue usage of the product.

templates.name: How do I use Rewards Points
templates.content: You can log into your account and click on the Pink Perks icon located on your screen's bottom left. You can spend the points by applying your balance to items in your cart when you check out or you can wait and accumulate them to spend on a more significant purchase! You won't be able to use points to purchase a gift card though, and points can't be combined with a coupon code. Once you hit a reward threshold, you must use that reward coupon in a single purchase; it won't carry a remaining balance.

templates.name: Will you send someone to help with assembly and installation?
templates.content: Instructions are included with each item sold on our website. If you need further help with furniture assembly, there are a number of product pages which have video guides on how to assemble your item. For lighting installation, we always suggest utilizing an electrician's expertise to mount your fixture. For either furniture assembly or mounting installation, we also suggest using a service like taskrabbit.com to get some extra help! Light assembly during delivery is available to purchase at checkout for some of our furniture items.

templates.name: Who do I need to speak to if I'm having issues with my windows?
templates.content: Our service department is equipped to handle any issues you might have with your windows. Please call 866-217-9582 for more information.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-888-450-0123 Monday-Friday, from 9am to 5pm PST, or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Are your products non-GMO?
templates.content: While we do support the non-GMO movement, our line is presently not non-GMO verified. Sourcing exclusively non-GMO ingredients is challenging in the world of dietary supplements as there is a lengthy process and validation required. However, we are exploring having a non-GMO offering in the future that will give users who value non-GMO products a choice within the OLLY lineup.

templates.name: Do you meet the FDA requirements?
templates.content: Nugenix is manufactured under strict FDA guidelines for Good Manufacturing Practices. The ingredients you'll find in Nugenix are carefully sourced to ensure maximum purity and potency.

templates.name: Shelf life
templates.content: Our oils don't actually have an expiration date. Essential oils do not "go bad" in that they become rancid, but their therapeutic properties can lose potency. If kept in a cool, dark place with the cap tightly sealed, oils should maintain their therapeutic potency for about 3-5 years. However, citrus oils have a shorter time frame of 1-3 years. Some oils, such as Patchouli, Vetiver and Blue Tansy actually increase in potency.

templates.name: Do I have to be home to accept a delivery?
templates.content: You don't need to be home, UPS will leave outside unless a signature requirement is requested.

templates.name: What is the best way to care for my Rubber watch straps?
templates.content: Rubber watch straps are sensitive to perspiration, salt water, and oil, which are easily absorbed and can cause the strap to crack and then break - so, periodic cleaning is recommended. Using an old soft toothbrush and a mild dish detergent and water, thoroughly cleanse the inside and outside of the strap. Completely rinse off any soap residue and then thoroughly dry the strap. If you expose your strap to salt water, be sure to rinse it with clear water as soon as possible. A rubber protectant may also be used to keep the strap pliable and extend lifespan.

templates.name: Silk seam hair - Why does it seem like there are a lot of broken pieces/short hairs/is this normal?
templates.content: Those short hairs are actually manufactured to be there. Because our hair extensions are cut in a v tapered formation which means that the hair is thinned out from top to bottom with layers in a v shape to better mimic natural hair for a more flawless natural blend.

templates.name: How do I layer my products?
templates.content: We know that everyone is different, and we encourage you to try using the products in ways that work best for your hair. As a general rule of thumb, products should be layered in the following order: step 1: shampoo/conditioner/masques, step 2: detanglers, heat protectants, leave-in conditioners, step 3: creams, mousses, gels, step 4: nourishing oils, serums and step 5: dry products like hair sprays and dry volume sprays.

templates.name: What kind of weather can I ride in (Pace 500.2)?
templates.content:
Pace 500.2 can and will withstand biking during most permitting weather conditions. However, it is an electric bike after all, with electrical components needing some added caution. Pace 500.2 is built to the IPX4 water-resistant standard. IPX4 is a standard that indicates your bike is resistant to multi-directional water splashes, meaning it is okay to ride or park your Pace 500.2 in rain. Light to moderate raindrops or splashes from a wet road will not harm your ebike, but be wary of harsher weather and rainfall conditions. Pace 500.2 tires are not intended for riding in snow or during snowfall.

The general rule of thumb is, if weather impacts your visibility and has the possibility to affect your bike's functionality, it is likely not a safe riding condition.

templates.name: When should I start flossing my child’s teeth?
templates.content: As soon as your kid has two teeth that touch one another. For some tots, this can be as early as one year old! We recommend starting no later than three years of age to help build a healthy, happy smile-care habit for life.

templates.name: How long does the lawn last?
templates.content: Under normal use, with a single dog, we expect the grass to last anywhere from 1-4 weeks. Your individual results vary depending on how heavily it's used (i.e. frequency of use each day, number of dogs using it, amount of urine, etc). We like to think of the lawn as a sponge. Meaning, the lawn performs best when it's dry (we recommend watering it very little so that it stays thirsty). When your pup uses it, urine will absorb into the soil. Over time, as it fills up, it may start to seep through. That's where the tray comes in. After a couple of deliveries, you'll get to know how long it lasts with your dog. At that point, it could still be green, brown, or somewhere in between.

templates.name: My extensions melted, why?
templates.content: Apologies for any issues experienced. If the hair purchased is 100% human remy hair, we do place a vitamin coating on it, and over time, this coating will slowly deteriorate or be washed off during usage. The coating will burn, melt, and become sticky when introduced to heat - this will be protecting the actual follicle from damage. The reaction you're experiencing is normal. If you want to remove the coating, you may have to wash it frequently/excessively but be cautious as removing the coating can damage the hair follicle as well as affect the lifespan. We suggest allowing the coating to deteriorate naturally over time.

templates.name: How do I wash my terry tops and bottoms?
templates.content: Our Terry collection is made of high-quality organic cotton designed to be extremely absorbent, breathable, soft, and comfortably casual. The tops can hang dry or lay flat to dry and the bottoms should lay flat to dry only. Please don't put them in the dryer.

templates.name: How does Inkbox work?
templates.content:
Inkbox works by sinking our For Now Ink™ into the top layer of your skin. During the application process, the ink reacts with the organic compounds in your skin to change its color to dark blue or black, depending on your unique skin chemistry. 

Traditional tattoos are permanent because they sit in your dermis. Inkbox sits in your epidermis, which naturally regenerates in 1-2 weeks. That's why our tattoos go from fresh to fade in roughly 1-2 weeks.

templates.name: Shipping time

We will send you a shipment notification email with a tracking number so you can follow your order on its way to your waiting hands.

templates.name: Shelf life
templates.content: Our tins are BPA-free and FDA-approved, so no worries, the chews inside are safe and secure. Store the tins in a cool, dry place to maintain freshness for up to 2 years.

templates.name: What's the difference between a mattress protector and a mattress pad?
templates.content: Purchasing a protector means you have the intention of preserving your investment by ensuring it won't be damaged. This is different than a pad, which generally implies changing the comfort of the bed. We leaned toward the former since we already love the feel of our mattresses!

templates.name: Social Media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/tees2urdoor/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/tees2urdoor

templates.name: Restock temp [autosend enabled]
templates.content: I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend signing up on the product page to be notified when it comes back in. Is there anything else you like? :)

templates.name: Do I need a bed frame? Can I put my mattress on the floor?
templates.content: We do not recommend putting your mattress directly on the floor. Having a bed frame comes with many benefits that add to your overall sleep quality and protect your mattress from premature damage. I suggest checking out our bed frames here: https://nectarsleep.attn.tv/sl/VbpC1e7k Let me know if you find something interesting!

templates.name: Anti aging skin type recommendation
templates.content: Thanks for letting me know. For your skin type, I would recommend our PMD Personal Microderm line.

templates.name: What's the cure time for coco apricot creme?
templates.content: The cure time is at least 3 days, but I would recommend curing it for 5-7 days with the lid on for an optimal scent throw.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Orders that come in after 12 pm EST will be processed the next business day. We ship via USPS or UPS and once shipped, it will take 1-7 business days domestically and 20-30 days internationally.

templates.name: When will my points expire?
templates.content: Points will expire twelve (12) months from the date the Points were earned. Points transferred from any preceding program into the current Program are considered to have been earned on the date of their transfer into the Program. You can check here for more info: https://onnit.attn.tv/a1zjJ22gQKRx

templates.name: Do you work with charities? Corporate Social Responsibility Activities
templates.content: We do work with charities! Please email contact@bombereyewear.com with the information you would like to be considered.

templates.name: Can I use the razor if I have sensitive skin?
templates.content: The razor was developed to work on all skin types. If you have sensitive skin, we recommend that you shave slowly and gently to avoid any irritation and follow with your favorite moisturizer to condition the skin.

templates.name: What wick size should I get?
templates.content: The wick size will depend on both the vessel diameter + wax type; you can determine the optimal wick size by using the wick size guide here: https://makesy.attn.tv/sl/rUU8zS_9 We strongly recommend getting the all inclusive sample kit as well since the burn test is the most reliable method for determining the optimal wick size.

templates.name: Is it possible for the Ponytail Extension to fall off/come undone?
templates.content: No, because we provide you with 2 matching bobby pins, a velcro wrap around strap, and 3 prongs, the ponytail extension will remain tightly secured if properly applied. So go ahead and unleash your inner Ariana and whip that ponytail back and forth!

templates.name: Is Carter dishwasher safe?
templates.content: We recommend hand washing your Carter in hot, soapy water with a long-handled soft bristle brush. Avoid using anything abrasive to clean Carter as it may damage the ceramic coating. After washing your Carter, you should dry by airing it out upside down and storing it with the lid off. This will help keep your Carter looking and smelling fresh. Running Carter through the dishwasher may cause discoloration of the coating.

templates.name: How long will one bottle last?
templates.content: The solution in our bottles should last you a similar length of time as a traditional cleaning spray bottle, hand soap, or dish soap. How long one bottle's worth of solution lasts depends on how often you clean and how much you use, often dependent on the size of your home and family.

templates.name: Can I replace the L-Bar with a Fast Bar or other types of nuts?
templates.content: Due to the carefully studied, carefully formulated macro- and micro-nutrient ratio in the L-Bar, there is no substitute that meets its exact profile. Although Fast Bar is very similar to ProLon's Nut L-Bars, there is a slight difference in size, calorie count and sugar content. Any substitute will likely differ from the ratio and amount of specific macro- and/or micro- nutrients and may interfere with the benefits of the diet. If you elect to simply omit the L- Bar, please note that changes in the food included in the program, including removal of foods, has not been studied. Any changes may result in interfere with both the safety and the outcome of the diet.

templates.name: What happens when I order a heavy or bulky item?
templates.content: Certain products can only be delivered by truck. Online these products will be identified on the product page as "Shipping restrictions apply - Truck Only". Your order will be processed, but placed on "HOLD" and a Customer Care representative will call you with an estimate of freight cost. Please allow additional time to process your order and scheduled delivery. Shipping service provider delivery dates may vary by region.

templates.content: We're all about sharing the warmth of Warmies so to make shopping convenient, we accept several payment methods, including MasterCard, American Express, Visa, Discover/Novus, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay.
